skills.name: BATTERY
desc: • Deals 3 hits of physical damage to all enemies.
• 35% Chance to gain a Guard Shield for 2 turns.
• Deal Additional Physical Damage for every negative effect currently on you.
• Damage dealt increases based on your MAX HP.

skills.name: AVAIL
desc: • Steal all negative effects from allies and place them on yourself.
• Grant an Extra Turn to the ally if Stun, Sleep, Taunt, or Freeze is removed.

skills.name: VITALIZE
desc: Heals allies every turn based on the number of negative effects currently on you. Heal amount based on your MAX HP.
